title: Capital Safeguard
description: Washington, D.C. Architect Elena Giovanni is being stalked. When Jacob Parsons breaks into her house and attacks her in the middle of the night, he is clearly immune to his restraining order. Being the sister-in-law to The President, Elena soon finds herself under the protection of a Secret Service agent whether she likes it or not. President’s orders. Fortunately, the agent is easy on the eyes and a consummate professional.Agent Kirk Hannlon fell for feisty Elena the moment he met her at a performance of Madame Butterfly. His protection is put to the test as Elena’s stalker attempts to intimidate her continuously despite the tight security. Kirk’s list of suspects accumulates as Elena goes about her business meeting clients, going for morning jogs, and attending social functions. Kirk must be vigilant, ever guarded. When Elena is pushed from the fifteenth floor of a construction site, Kirk springs into action to save her in the nick of time. The stalker’s efforts have clearly escalated. With their stress and desire mounting to a fever pitch, the throws of passion are sure to mellow the tension. When Kirk finally catches Jacob Parsons, the interrogation reveals he was simply a pawn. The real mastermind is still at large. What ensues is nail-biting suspense that is sure to end with the loss of a life. Will Elena and Kirk make it out alive?
author: Stella Kelly
